column5: I finished up our yearly video, another great year on O'Sullivan Lake with great friends and family. Seems like it gets better every year. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_qkeplSv9aM
Looks great! Is that the drive to lodge?
Very nice video, well done, and with thought. A lot looks pretty familiar, I'll be checking out those spots next week! Bill
Thanks for sharing your fishing video. I am curious on what you used to capture the underwater footage of the walleye chasing you rig. What camera and what mount(s) device? Thanks

http://www.waterwolfhd.com/en/ we rigged it just behind a bottom bouncer, next time we will shorten the spinner harness to 36"...fish are defeifinlty not afaid of it. We also set one up to to float a foot off the bottom on a float.
Another excellent video by the Kurtz Brothers....great to see your Dad with you this year.... Always enjoy watching your northern adventures up at Nakina... thanks for sharing, Rich B
I'm going to o'sullivans labor day week. your video is posted on youtube? which one is it.

Wildernessuke, 2016 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_qkeplSv9aM&t=14s 2015 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yFLLhZei1sE&t=1863s 2015 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=asfB530HEgQ 2014 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jpt3KPWBZnE&t=2433s and there are more back to 2010. All the videos are on OS since then, enjoy!
